content: poppy - is a replica of the traditional fabric poppy we purchase today in canada to support the veterans who went to war for our freedom as a knitter i thought it would be nice to have a woolly one as well you can make one of these in less than an hour using your scraps it takes less than 4 grams of worsted weight yarn approximately 8 yards gauge is not important for this project you have the choice of working it flat or in the round the outcome will look the same remembrance day - lest we forget - november 11th note - donations to the poppy fund are greatly appreciated to support veteran care thank you happy knitting
